articles.title: HDFC Bank increases MCLR on loans by 20 basis points
articles.description: This will raise the cost of housing, vehicle, personal, and other loans, and borrowers will see a rise in equated monthly instalments (EMI) for different types of loans.
articles.content: Private sector lender, has raised its marginal cost of funds-based lending rate (MCLR) on loans across all tenures by 20 basis points (100 basis points = 1%), effective from July 7, 2022. This will r… [+946 chars]
